definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feel a loathing (‖ form of [[קוּץ]] q.v.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[אָקוּט בְּדוֹר]] Ps 95:10 I felt a loathing at the generation.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl. consec. [[וּנְקׂטׂתֶם בִּפְנֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 20:43 ye shall feel loathing against your faces (at yourselves), c. [[ב]] rei, so Eze 36:31 ([[עַל]] rei); metapl. (as if from [[קטט]]) 3 pl. consec. [[וְנׇקׂטוּ בִפְנֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 6:9 ([[אֶל]] rei, for [[עַל]], + [[ל]] rei, for which Co [[בְּ]] Krae [[בְּ]] or [[עַל]]); also 3 fs. [[נָֽקְטָה נַפְשַׁי בְּ]] Job 10:1 (as if from [[נקט]]*; on both forms v. Ges:§ § 67 dd, 72 dd).

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: id. Impf. 1 s. [[אֶתְקוֹטָט בְּ]] Ps 139:21 (We [[אֶתְקוֹמֵם]]); abs. [[וׇאֶתְקוֹטָָטָה]] Ps 119:158.—Ez Eze 16:47 v. [[קָט]]; Job 8:14 v. foll. p. 881
